contentdroplets-desc: VisualEditor integration for inserting predefined content snippets
contentdroplets-droplet-text-box-success: Adds colored panel for a success note
contentdroplets-droplet-text-box-warning: Adds colored panel for a warning note
contentdroplets-droplet-text-box-importa: Adds colored panel for an important note
contentdroplets-droplet-text-box-note-de: Adds colored panel for a note
contentdroplets-droplet-text-box-tip-des: Adds colored panel for a tip
contentdroplets-droplet-icon-font-size-h: To adjust the font size, the unit must be specified, e.g., 15px, 0.83em, or 1.2rem
contentdroplets-droplet-icon-color-help: All hex values (e.g., '#3366cc') can be used for colors, as well as CSS color descriptions such as 'yellow', 'blue', or 'black'
contentdroplets-droplet-icon-orientation: Values can be set for the CSS property 'vertical-align' to adjust the alignment of the icon: 'baseline', 'text-top', 'text-bottom', 'sub', or 'super'
